group_1.textLeft: And now, as a symbol of our renewed peace...

group_1.textRight: With the juice the chief priest bought for us...

group_1.textLeft: Goodness me, the Tokime Clan has so many@banquets.

group_1.textRight: We certainly do, as the adults from our village held@many banquets of their own.
Hey hey, Asahi-chan, is this what you made?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed it is.
It may seem unrefined, but wild game cooking@is my specialty.

group_1.textRight: It's super good!
I was thinking it was gonna reek more of animal,
but I was completely wrong about that!
Yes, it's very delicious!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you found it pleasing to your palate.
To lessen the animal smell,
I did all sorts of prep work.@It was well worth it.

group_1.textRight: ...Um, Asahi-chan, I'm really sorry for all this time.

group_1.textLeft: Not at all, there's no need to continue talking@about it.
I was just as responsible for the misunderstanding@to begin with.
We equally went overboard.

group_1.textRight: But...um, there's just been one thing really bugging@me.
Would it be okay if I asked?

group_1.textLeft: That depends on what it is...

group_1.textRight: Um, the ghost!
That one thing has me so super curious!
If you don't want to talk about it, though...@That's...totally fiiine...

group_1.textLeft: Your face and your words are conflicting.
...That was my unique magic.

group_1.textRight: Unique magic?

group_1.textLeft: See, was I not saying that from the start?!

group_1.textRight: Huuuh, that's all it was?
Asahi's unique magic is something that allows@talking to ghosts?

group_1.textLeft: Well, that is about the gist of it.
The woman I was speaking to was the previous@owner of a cat she sheltered.
I heard she lived alone, and wondered if the cat@had been adopted,
so using my unique magic, I confirmed it myself.

group_1.textRight: So that's what happened...
You're kind to humans and animals alike,@aren't you Asahi?
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]And here I was calling her Onibaba...Uu...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, Chiharu-dono's become blue again...

group_1.textRight: The chief priest's gotten us snacks as his treat@to us!

group_1.textLeft: I also prepared some hot tea, but...
Are you in the middle of something...?
No, my thanks. I will gladly partake.

group_1.narration: ―Chika―@Eh, was it that hot? Excuse me...
―Asahi―@Ahh no, don't worry, there's no problem.@I just have a bit of a cat's tongue is all...
―Asahi―@I am usually attentive, but it is entirely my responsibility@for becoming distracted.

group_1.textLeft: ...There's something kind of unexpected.

group_1.textRight: Sure is, feels like we mighta just discovered a whole@new side of her.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh...? I was just overreacting about the@cat's tongue.

group_1.textRight: Is that so...

group_1.textLeft: Is something the matter?

group_1.textRight: There is no need to pry information to get to learn@about someone.
Like how I learned that Asahi has a cat tongue@just now,
as we spend our days with one another,@we will come to learn details.
It's just natural.
...Which is why I'm sorry.
We wanted to become your friends, Asahi.@We tried to get to know you by force,
but that was not okay, was it?
...That's right.
Not hurriedly, but leisurely getting to know each@other is what is okay.
Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: If you would do so, I will be equally as grateful to@you.
